token_name.title: PAT Token Name
token_name.description: To create the token see the documentation

#token_secret.title: PAT Token Secret
#token_secret.description: To create the token see the documentation

endpoint.title: Tableau server API endpoint URL
endpoint.description: Just the domain part from the URL, e.g. https://dub01.online.tableau.com

site_id.title: Tableau Site ID. Use with online version
site_id.description: The Site ID can be found in the URL: https://dub01.online.tableau.com/#/site/SITE_ID/home

poll_mode.title: Poll mode
poll_mode.description: If set to `Yes` the trigger will wait for all triggered jobs to finish, otherwise it will trigger all the jobs and finish successfully right after.

datasources.title: Tableau datasources
datasources.description: List of datasources with extracts to trigger. Note that there must be appropriate tasks/schedules set for all these sources otherwise the execution will fail

name.title: Data source name.
name.description: Required Data source name as found in Tableau.

tag.title: Data source tag.
tag.description: Optional data source tag as found in Tableau.

luid.title: Tableu server unique LUID of the datasource (as represented via API)
luid.description: Optional unique datasource identifier i.e. xx12-3324-1323, available via API. This ensures unique identification of the datasource. If specified, the 'tag' parameter is ignored. Fill this in after the first execution. The LUID will be printed in the component job log.
